name: A Guardian's Dream
description:
The Scarlet Devil Mansion is hosting a large party where only devils are invited. It's the guard's job to keep unwanted guests out

But knowing Meiling, she's probably going to sleep on the job anyway. So Patchouli came up with a new spell that lets Meiling do her job using her dream!

How to play
  • Click on smol Meiling to invite the next guest in line
  • Click on smol Sakuya to kick the next guest in line.
  • Only devils are invited:
  • Fairies are not invited:
  • You have 60 seconds to meet the quota for each round, shown in the bottom left. Making too many mistakes or failing to get enough correct answers within the time limit will result in Sakuya throwing a knife at Meiling as a punishment.
Credits
  • Design: ChocolaMint
  • Programming: ChocolaMint
  • Art: ChocolaMint
  • Music: AshKaperdon
  • Assets used:
    • Kasri - Candy Crayon font
    • KonitaTutorials - Correct/wrong answer SFX
